title: “Juggernauts”
body:
Because its fair for a champion to both be super tank and have massive AOE damage and sustain and 1v5 capability.

Every argument for them is “dont 1v1 them” 

So youre saying theyre balanced when I literally need my entire team to kill them. LOL 
This even applies to bruisers too! Theyre all the same!

replies.body:
So long as just about every ADC in the game can kill a juggernaut while walking away, and more importantly so long as the same ADC can infinitely chase down and kill the juggernaut through raw attrition you don't really get to complain.

Learn to kite.  Learn positioning.  That's it.
Hey guys Im just going to kill this guy with 4k hp and 300 armor that can still 1 shot me! Its not like juggernauts have speed boosts or ranged slows or ways to grab me or anything!
Something tells me you don't know what attrition means...
Something tells me you live in fantasy land where ADCs can 1v1 anything
Stop being bad and learn to kite mate.  Others have, what's your excuse?
Im going to kite this Mundo watch me!
So Mundo then?  That's the champion giving you troubles?
Mundo? {{item:3123}} I win

Sorry, let me correct myself.

Learn to kite and dodge skillshots.

Better?
{{champion:51}}: Don't worry loves, I got the range and the traps.
Sorry Im not in bronze where retards walk into traps
You sound like you just got out of bronze and are flaming cuz now you think you're "good"
Ahh, this takes me back.
Sadly. the idiocy never ended.
I've learned that it's expecting too much for it to fully end.  Instead just take it as cheap entertainment and hopefully someone will learn the truth.

It probably never ended because tanky champs that have high damage and have no counterplay other than kite and kill them 1v3 - 1v5 like a raidboss are by far the most frustrating, especially now that assassins get reworked.

Go get laid

Have a kid

Let him grow to about 5 years old

Get them a kite cause apparently your parents ever taught you what that was since you can't deal with a slow ass fucker running at you.

this meme again

yes, champions that are strong melee duelists will kill you 1v1. what a shock, you can't facetank their damage and live.

nevermind that any champion with strong kite will whittle them down, that they're probably the champion group weakest to slows relative to the entire roster, that they stack HP more than resists which makes them weak to % damage, you get free grievous wounds on {{item:3123}} if you for some reason can't dodge Darius Q or Illaoi's tentacles pre-ult, or that despite their lack of gapclosers and generally situational damage they still destroyed by other melee DPS because, what do you know, they aren't that broken
Nerf Irelia please? LOL☺

When people don't understand the slightest bit what they're talking about.
LUL

Bronze 5 and sub 30% winrate
LOL

I can't tell what's funnier.
You not knowing the difference between a 4 and a 5, or thinking that rank means anything.
Rank doesn't mean anything! Only a bronze trash would say that LOL
what rank are you ? since you are hiding your main account
Rank honestly doesn't mean anything (nearly plat here, ADC main, never have a problem with Juggs. Now argue)
lul cry more

Level 7 Smurf who is either too much of a coward to post on their actual account or had that account banned and can't seem to take the hint.

LOL
Does it even matter? 99.9% of players are more skilled then that nep2une guy LOL
Man can you even be more wrong?  He's Bronze 4.  That means he's better than everyone in Bronze 5 and most of the lol community is bronze.

23.93% are bronze 40.09% are silver 

http://na.op.gg/statistics/tier/
Its not bronze 5 its bronze 4! Get it right ! omg cant stop laughing HAHAHAHAHA
I said he's Bronze 4.  He's technically better than everyone in Bronze 5.
and considering that you're sitting here complaining about one of the highest counterplay classes in the game i assume you aren't a very high elo either.
The counterplay is 5v1 them. LOL
no it isn't and maybe you just refuse to learn how to play against them. **don't get into their range** it's really simple.
The counterplay is don't walk right into them lol

"One of the highest counterplay classes"

"They are impossible to fight, run away and wait till you can 1v3 them with your team" :D
so if you are adc and have range... and they are juggernauts ( typically no gap closer at all or hard cc ) how are you getting caught ?
By being a shit ADC?
yep...

You seem to be under the impression that ADCs have to be able to whoop every other class without issue.

Being an effective marksmen requires effective positioning and Kiting. You won't go far if you can't stop a Garen from running at you.

You could also say its unfair that ranged get to build full damage and apply it safely. While they also get defensive stats with some of their itemization and literally the best masteries in the game.
{{champion:127}} will save you from the depths of Plastic. Actually no, reading your comments, you might just actually find a way to lose against a juggernaut with Liss.

*ice claws right into their face*
*dies*
WTF YOU SAID THIS WILL HELP
Lmao
Tfw Liss has like 45% or lower win rate against Illaoi, Darius and Nasus Kappa

Lolwut, was not aware of this. Honestly, never seen a Liss lose lane against a juggenaut...well aside from Nasus. The other juggernauts need to hit a skillshot to sustain so this easy to play around, Nasus can just do his thing while ignoring my damage tanks to in built lifesteal and Q. 
That's so weird though, I wonder why it's so low against Darius/Illaoi.

http://lolalytics.com/champion/Lissandra/Top/
I guess she wins lane but then cant really kill them with Spirit Visage or something like that anymore and kind of gets outscaled.
